label: Sales Module
persona: Complete sales pipeline and CRM functionality
summary:
Complete Sales & CRM Platform

A comprehensive sales management system that transforms how your team finds, nurtures, and closes deals. From initial lead capture to post-sale relationship management, every interaction is tracked, automated, and optimized.

Intelligent Lead Management

Capture leads from your website, social media, trade shows, and referrals into one centralized database. AI-powered lead scoring ranks prospects based on engagement, fit, and likelihood to buy. Automatic lead routing assigns prospects to the right sales rep based on territory, product expertise, or workload. Never lose a lead in the cracks.

Visual Sales Pipeline

Drag-and-drop deal cards through your custom pipeline stages. See your entire sales funnel at a glanceâ€”identify bottlenecks, forecast revenue, and spot deals that need attention. Customize stages to match your sales process exactly. Set probability percentages by stage for accurate revenue forecasting.

Automated Follow-Up Sequences

Create email nurture campaigns that automatically send based on prospect behavior. Trigger sequences when leads download content, attend webinars, or visit pricing pages. Personalized templates maintain your brand voice while saving hours of manual outreach. A/B test subject lines and content to optimize response rates.

Activity Tracking & Reminders

Log every call, email, meeting, and demo automatically. Set follow-up reminders that ensure no prospect goes cold. Sales reps see their daily to-do list prioritized by deal value and time sensitivity. Managers get visibility into team activity without micromanaging.

AI-Powered Sales Intelligence

Get next-best-action recommendations based on what's worked with similar deals. Identify at-risk opportunities based on low engagement or long silence periods. Receive alerts when key stakeholders change companies or when prospects visit your pricing page. Competitive intelligence tracking flags when prospects mention competitors.

Proposal & Quote Generation

Create professional proposals with branded templates. Dynamic pricing tables pull from your product catalog. E-signature integration closes deals faster. Track when prospects view proposals and which sections they spend time on.

Team Collaboration

Share notes, tag colleagues for assistance, and collaborate on complex deals. Team-wide visibility prevents duplicate outreach and enables smooth account transitions. Sales managers coach more effectively with full context on every interaction.

Integration Ecosystem

Two-way sync with email (Gmail, Outlook), calendar, and phone systems. Connect to marketing automation platforms for seamless lead handoff. Push closed deals to your billing system automatically. API access for custom integrations.

Sales Analytics & Reporting

Real-time dashboards show pipeline value, win rates, average deal size, and sales cycle length. Individual and team performance metrics identify top performers and coaching opportunities. Revenue forecasting with confidence intervals helps leadership make informed business decisions.

Built for sales teams who believe that consistent process and smart automation drive predictable revenue growth.
